comment: It appears that there are a great many haters here. And how they justify their outrageous, out-in-space opinions is beyond me. And I heard that this latest shooter in Pittsburgh is affiliated with this site. So I'm here to check GAB out. Bring it.
amr:
# ::snt It appears that there are a great many haters here. And how they justify their outrageous, out-in-space opinions is beyond me. And I heard that this latest shooter in Pittsburgh is affiliated with this site. So I'm here to check GAB out. Bring it.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (a / appear-02
            :ARG1 (p / person
                  :ARG0-of (h / hate-01)
                  :quant (m2 / many
                        :mod (g / great))
                  :location (h2 / here)))
      :snt2 (a2 / and
            :op2 (b / beyond
                  :op1 (ii / i)
                  :domain (t / thing
                        :manner-of (j / justify-01
                              :ARG0 p
                              :ARG1 t
                              :ARG1-of (o / opine-01
                                    :ARG0 p)
                              :ARG0-of (o2 / outrageous-02)
                              :mod (o3 / out-06
                                    :ARG2 (s / space))))))
      :snt3 (a3 / and
            :op2 (h3 / hear-01
                  :ARG0 (ii2 / i)
                  :ARG1 (a4 / affiliate-01
                        :ARG1 (p2 / person
                              :ARG0-of (s2 / shoot-02)
                              :mod (t2 / this)
                              :mod (l / last)
                              :location (c / city
                                    :name (n / name
                                          :op1 "Pittsburgh")))
                        :ARG2 (s3 / site
                              :mod (t3 / this)))))
      :snt4 (c2 / cause-01
            :ARG1 (b2 / be-located-at-91
                  :ARG1 ii2
                  :ARG2 (h4 / here)
                  :purpose (c3 / check-out-05
                        :ARG0 ii2
                        :ARG1 (o4 / organization
                              :name (n2 / name
                                    :op1 "GAB")))))
      :snt5 (b3 / bring-01
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (ii3 / it)))

comment: There are anti-semites on Gab. They are mostly Islamic operatives who want to see all Jewish people destroyed because that is what is commanded in the Koran. They pretend to be Nazis to wind up the few Nazi morons on Gab. Gab is about free speech. You can get on here and counter any argument or statements that you disagree with.
amr:

They pretend to be Nazis to wind up the few Nazi morons on Gab. Gab is about free speech. You can get on here and counter any argument or statements that you disagree with.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (o / oppose-01
            :ARG0 (p / person
                  :mod (e / ethnic-group
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "Jew")))
            :location (p2 / publication
                  :name (n2 / name

                        :op1 "Islam"))
            :quant (m2 / most)
            :ARG0-of (w / want-01
                  :ARG1 (s / see-01
                        :ARG0 p3
                        :ARG1 (d / destroy-01
                              :ARG1 (p4 / person
                                    :mod (r2 / religious-group
                                          :name (n4 / name
                                                :op1 "Jew"))
                                    :mod (a / all)))
                        :ARG1-of (c / cause-01
                              :ARG0 (c2 / command-02
                                    :ARG0 (b / book
                                          :name (n5 / name
                                                :op1 "Koran"))
                                    :ARG2 d)))))
      :snt3 (p5 / pretend-01
            :ARG0 (t / they)
            :ARG1 (p6 / person
                  :mod (p7 / political-movement
                        :name (n6 / name
                              :op1 "Nazism")))
            :purpose (w2 / wind-up-02
                  :ARG0 t
                  :ARG1 (m3 / moron
                        :quant (f / few)
                        :mod p7)
                  :location p2))
      :snt4 (c3 / concern-02
            :ARG0 (p8 / publication
                  :name (n7 / name
                        :op1 "Gab"))
            :ARG1 (s2 / speak-01
                  :ARG3-of (f2 / free-04)))
      :snt5 (p9 / possible-01
            :ARG1 (a2 / and
                  :op1 (g / get-05
                        :ARG1 (y / you)
                        :ARG2 (h2 / here))
                  :op2 (c4 / counter-01
                        :ARG0 y
                        :ARG1 (o3 / or
                              :op1 (a3 / argue-01)
                              :op2 (s3 / state-01)
                              :mod (a4 / any)
                              :ARG1-of (d2 / disagree-01
                                    :ARG0 y))))))

comment: Try not to use derogatory words please.
amr:
# ::snt Try not to use derogatory words please.
(t / try-01
      :mode imperative
      :polite +
      :ARG0 (y / you)
      :ARG1 (u / use-01
            :polarity -
            :ARG0 y
            :ARG1 (w / word
                  :mod (d / derogatory))))

comment: hey there, xenophobic and derogatory slurs are offensive and hurtful and should not be used. Please refrain from these types of comments.
amr:

(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (a / and
            :op1 (o / offend-01
                  :ARG0 (s / slur
                        :mod (x / xenophobia)
                        :mod (d / derogatory)))
            :op2 (h / hurt-01
                  :ARG0 s)
            :op3 (r / recommend-01
                  :polarity -
                  :ARG1 (u / use-01
                        :ARG1 s))
            :mod (h2 / hey
                  :mode expressive)
            :location (t / there))
      :snt2 (r2 / refrain-01
            :mode imperative
            :polite +
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (c / comment-01
                  :mod (t2 / type
                        :mod (t3 / this)))))
